metadata.title: CVE-2024-24785 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: If errors returned from MarshalJSON methods contain user controlled data,they may be used to break the contextual auto-escaping behavior of thehtml/template package, allowing for subsequent actions to inject unexpectedcontent into templates.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.21 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
